TopicTitle: Want to make a mission, specifically about Kerbal's tolerence

Articles.Content: Is it possible to make a mission where a Kerbalnaut cannot exceed a very low amount of G/acceleration even in space?
I am going to investigate this issue... g-tolerance tweaking by editing the the savefile should be doable before releasing a custom mission.
In settings you can change the amount of G force needed to kill a kerbal.
